name: BattleShrimp
description:
The battle for the shrimp dominance has begun. Choose a shrimp hero, become a shrimp champion.

Click to move. Click close to your shrimp to attack. 1 and 2 on the keyboard or touchscreen activate special attacks(see help page for details)

Note: The current server is fairly limited. In the off chance 12 players are already in game, you may not be able to join.
